name: some crappy racecar audio visualizer or something
name_original: some crappy racecar audio visualizer or something
description:
it's like, some kinda interactive audio visualizer. the cars are from Edy's Vehicle Physics. The shaders are all mine though, and display RMS or spectrum data. I thought that was neat. 

you can also look at two other visualizers from the pause menu, they're alright.

there is no objective. you cannot win. much like irl
